p: Carotenoids with seven and more double bonds (conjugated) are identified for good AA (Borsarelli & Mercadante, 2009). Trans‐BC is highly sensitive to heat and light and isomerizes to cis‐isomers when exposed; for instance, Vásquez‐Caicedo, Schilling, Carle, and Neidhart ( 2007) reported the processing of fruits leads to cis‐ trans isomer formation and this processes is very particular in case of 13‐ cis‐BC formations (Lozano‐Alejo, Carrillo, Pixley, & Palacios‐Rojas, 2007). 9‐ cis‐BC in various foods was reported when exposed to light (Lozano‐Alejo et al., 2007; Schieber & Carle, 2005), while 13‐ cis‐AC and BC isomers are identified in extended storage durations (Tang & Chen, 2000).
